2023年9月2日

使用块构建页面

了解 Nebulix 的多样化内容块、MDX 集成与吸引人的视图切换
Docs Features
  • Home
  • blog
  • Docs
  • 使用块构建页面

Main content

Each page features a primary MDX content field, serving as the core content area. We’ve integrated the @remark-embedder/transformer-oembed plugin for seamless embed support. Adding images is also effortlessly accomplished within this content space.

What are blocks?

In Nebulix, blocks are fundamental building elements that enable yu to construct custom web pages. These blocks serve as the foundational components for your webpage’s layout and content.

What makes Nebula particularly powerful is that each block can be individually styled using custom classes, allowing you to fine-tune their appearance, adjust container widths, and even modify their surfaces.

View Transitions

This theme harnesses the power of the View Transitions API. Please note that transition names for elements must be unique. Therefore, only one page transition can be active on the same page. To enable animations, you’ll find an option on every block that can link to another page or image.

Nebulix Page Blocks:

  • Text-Image
  • gallery
  • Recent Items
  • Features
  • Rich Text

Text Image

Explore our versatile content block featuring three distinct templates: banner, column, and row, each offering unique customization options. You also have the flexibility to include buttons to enhance your content.

Banner Template: The banner template transforms your content into a captivating parallax banner with a stunning image background. You have full control over setting the container width to match your design vision.

Column Template: Create dynamic layouts with our column template, allowing you to organize your content into two columns. Customize the container width and image width, choosing from options such as 25%, 33%, 50%, 66%, and 75%. You can even reverse the order of image and text for added flexibility.

Row Template: The row template presents your content in a stacked format, seamlessly blending images and text for a visually appealing presentation.

Text Image Column

This is a text image block reversed with a xl container and image width is 66%

Image at 50%

This is a text image block with no container and image width is 50%

Gallery Block

Unlock the potential of our Gallery Block, where you can curate your selection of images, customize the aspect ratio, and tailor the container size to suit your creative vision.

Image Gallery

Recent Items

Utilize the Recent Items Block to showcase a diverse range of content, whether it's blog posts, menus, or projects. Tailor your display with the option to select a template (grid or list), adjust the container size, specify the item count, and apply filters based on your preferred tags.

启用电子简报

在 Nebulix 中如何启用电子简报

Docs Features

Features

This block offers a flexible layout that allows you to effortlessly incorporate features into your content. You can add features alongside text, link icons, and even customize the icon colors to align with your design preferences.
